divs: sighting detailsgolden like orbs suddenly appearing in the western sky and fading out in a sequence. first it started out as just one light then faded instantly out. then about 4 minutes later more over towards the south\western sky 3 golden ords appeared then faded out one right after the other then within 15 minutes more lights appeared above the jerome cheese co. there were seven golden orbs all of them in a row and were lighted up then starting with the one on the left faded out then the next then the next and so on until they were all gone. then 10 minutes later three lights appeared over the plastic bag company across the street from the jerome cheese co. then they faded out. it continues to go on now, my fiance' is out back watching this continue while he is on the phone with the t.v. station trying to find out what is going on????
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Jerome
There were no other sightings in Jerome on or around September 11th 2007
Summary: sequence of lights fading in and out in a row disappearing and reappearing several minutes later
